mapper.select: select * from board order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(num, writer, subject, passwd, content) values ( (select nvl(max(num)+1, 1) from board) , #{writer}, #{subject}, #{passwd}, #{content} )
mapper.select: select passwd from board where num=#{num} and passwd=#{passwd}
mapper.update: update board set readcount = readcount + 1 where num=#{num}
